artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical in blue paper covers (P.15,523) bound with folded music sheet (P.15,524) with score on the recto and verso; includes a hand-colored engraving with two women in fashionable dress of the period (P.15,521-P.15,522)
medium: Hand-colored engraving; engraved musical score; letterpress
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Dix-neuvième Cahier, 25 Août 1790
